name: Conundrums
description:
Conundrums is the social, ever expanding online game made up of 'would you rather' questions.
"The best WYR Ever!" -- actual user review. We agree and so will you.

Join our extremely active and growing community of over 400k players, who have cast over 20 million votes on over 10k original, moderated questions.

We will ask life's most difficult questions, like "Would You Rather Save a Starving Child or Own a Real Lightsaber."

Rate and discuss questions and see how other people answered. Follow your favorite questions and users.

Ask your own Questions and see how your friends respond.

Unlike others, our questions are MODERATED to ensure high quality.

Explore our platform: Browse our top and newest users, questions and comments.

Would you rather.. download conundrums OR miss out on all the fun??

======

* Would You Rather™ is a registered trademark of Spinmaster Games LLC. This product is in no way affiliated or endorsed by Spinmaster Games and should not be confused with their product, Would You Rather™.
